body_html:
While it's not integrated to pytorch, @SeanNaren created a pytorch binding for Baidu's implementation of warp-ctc, which is a great, fast and parallel implementation of ctc both on gpu and on cpu.
I use it all the time and its awesome! Also, thanks to @SeanNaren its very easy to install and use :)
link: https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc
If you want an example of how to correctly use it, I'll be happy to help :)

body:
While it's not integrated to pytorch, @SeanNaren created a pytorch binding for Baidu's implementation of warp-ctc, which is a great, fast and parallel implementation of ctc both on gpu and on cpu.
I use it all the time and its awesome! Also, thanks to @SeanNaren its very easy to install and use :)
link: https://github.com/SeanNaren/warp-ctc
If you want an example of how to correctly use it, I'll be happy to help :)
